hero.title: Nikela umfutho kuKoparetivu yakho
hero.subtitle: Hlolisa Tinhloso tekuSimama
hero.description: Kulula, kuphephile, futhi kunemthelela—sita ikoparetivu yakho kutsi icwale esikhatsini sedijithali kantsi yakha tindlela tesimama tetemnotfo.

items.title: Kuhlolwa kwekuSimama
items.description: Hlela tindlela temvelo, tenhlalakahle, kanye nekuphatsa kutsi wakhe ikoparetivu lesimeme nekutetsembela kakhulu.

items.title: Tihlelo temsebenti
items.description: Landzelela inchubekela yakho ngetibhodi teKanban letisebentako, kuguqula tinchazelo tekulungisa kube yimisebenti lephatswako kanye netintfo letitfolakalako.

items.title: Yakhelwe tikoparetivu
items.description: Yenzelwe ngokukhethekile tinhlangano tekoparetivu eNingizimu Afrika

items.title: Kusekela tilwimi letinyenti
items.description: Kuyatfolakala ngeSingisi, siSwati, siPutukezi, siZulu, siJalimani, kanye nesiFulentshi

items.title: Kusebenta ngaphandle kwe-intanethi
items.description: Kusebenta ngendlela letetsembekile noma kuncane kakhulu lokuxhumana ne-intanethi

userGuide.title: Umhlahlandlela Womsebenzisi Wetinkampani Letibambisene
userGuide.subtitle: Umhlahlandlela lophelele wokusebentisa ipulatifomu yekuhlola kusimama ye-DGRV

quickStart.title: Kucala Lokusheshako
quickStart.step1: 1. 📋 Cala noma uphendvule kuhlolo kusuka ku-dashboard yakho
quickStart.step5: 5. 📊 Sebenzisa imiphumela kudala emacebo wesenzo futsi ulandzele inqubekela

gettingStarted.title: Kucala
content: Siyakwamukela ku-Pulatifomu Yekuhlola Kusimama ye-DGRV! Le thuluzi iyasita inkampani yakho lebambisene kutsi ilinganise futsi ithuthukise imikhuba yayo yokusimama.
I-dashboard yakho inikeza kufinyelela ekuhloleni, emacebo wesenzo, kanye nemathuluzi ekulandzelela inqubekela.
Uma ungumphatsi wenhlangano, ungadala kuhlolo lokusha futsi uphate emalunga eqembu. Basebentisi benhlangano bangaphendvula kuhlolo futsi balandzele inqubekela.

roles.title: Kukuqonda Tindima Tabasebentisi
content: Umphatsi Wenhlangano (org_admin): Angadala kuhlolo lokusha, aphate basebentisi, futsi abone yonkhe idatha yenhlangano.
Umsebentisi Wenhlangano (Org_User): Angaphendvula kuhlolo lokuniketwe, abone imiphumela, futsi aphate emacebo wesenzo.
Bobabili tindima bangafinyelela ku-dashboard, babone lokuthunyelwe, futsi bakhiphe imibiko yenhlangano yabo.

assessments.title: Kwenta Kuhlolo
content: Kuhlolo kuhlelwe ngetigaba (sib. Imvelo, Umphakatsi, Kukuphatsa) nemibuto esigabeni ngasinye.
Kumbuto ngamunye, nikeza: impendvulo Yebo/Cha, iphesenti lekugcwalisa (0%, 25%, 50%, 75%, 100%), kanye nekuchazela kwesibhalo lokuningiliziwe.
Unganamathisela emafayela ukuze usekele timpendvulo takho (max 1MB ngefayela ngalinye). Sebenzisa i-ayikhon yekunamathisela ukuze engeze emadokhumenti.
Londoloza inqubekela yakho noma nini usebentisa 'Londoloza Isiqeshana'. Gcwalisa yonkhe imibuto esigabeni ngaphambi kokuya esilandzelako.
Uma sekuthunyelwe, kuhlolo kudlula inkhubo yekubuyekezwa ngaphambi kwekuvunywa kokugcina.

actionPlans.title: Kukuphatsa Emacebo Wesenzo
content: Emacebo wesenzo akusita kutsi ulandzele imisebenti yekuthuthukisa lesekelwe ezindvululweni zekuhlolo.
Sebentisa ibhodi ye-Kanban ukuze uhambise imisebenti ngemazinga: Lokwenziwayo → Kwenziwayo → Kwenziwe → Kuvunyiwe.
Engeza imisebenti lemisha, bheka tizikhathi, futsi unikeze emalunga eqembu ukuze ulandzele inqubekela ngempumelelo.
Kuvuselelwa lokuvamile kwecebo lakho lesenzo kubonisa imizamo yekuthuthukisa lokuqhubekako.
Khipha emacebo wesenzo ukuze wabelane ngenqubekela nababambiqhaza kanye nekuphatsa.

viewingResults.title: Kubona Imiphumela Yekuhlolo
content: Finyelela konke lokuthunyelwe kwakho nge-'Bona Kuhlolo' ku-dashboard.
Landzelela simo sekuthunyelwa: Kusalindele Kukubuyekezwa → Kuyabuyekezwa → Kuvunyiwe/Kunqatshiwe/Kuceliwe Kukubuyekezwa.
Bona impendvulo lokuningiliziwe kanye nezindvululo zekubuyekezwa ukuze uqonde tindzawo tekuthuthukisa.
Qhathanisa imiphumela ngemahora lahlukene wekuhlolo ukuze ulandzele inqubekela yenkampani yakho lebambisene.
Sebentisa kukubukeka kwekuthunyelwe ukuze ubuyekezwe timpendvulo takho kanye nemadokhumenti lasekelako.

creatingAssessments.title: Kudala Kuhlolo (Baphatsi Kuphela)
content: Baphatsi benhlangano bangaqala emasikeli lamasha wekuhlolo wenkampani yabo lebambisene.
Chofoza 'Cala Kuhlolo Kusimama' ukuze udale isiqeshana lesisha sekuhlolo.
Yabelana nge-ID yekuhlolo nemalunga eqembu ukuze bakwazi kufaka sandla etigabeni letihlukene.
Qapha inqubekela futsi uqinisekise kutsi zonke tigaba tigcwalisiwe ngaphambi kwekuthunyelwa kokugcina.
Ungathumeli kuhlolo kuphela lapho zonke tigaba letidingekako tigcwalisiwe ngokuphelele.

userManagement.title: Kukuphatsa Emalunga Eqembu (Baphatsi Kuphela)
content: Baphatsi benhlangano bangangeza futsi baphate emalunga eqembu nge-'Phatsa Basebentisi'.
Mema basebentisi labasha nge-imeyili futsi unikeze tindima letifanele lesekelwe tizibopho tabo.
Nikeza basebentisi kufinyelela kutigaba ukuze bakwazi kufaka sandla tindzawo letithile tekuhlolo.
Susa basebentisi labangasadingi kufinyelela ukuze ugcine kukuphepha kanye nekuthembeka kwedatha.
Buyekezwa ngokuvamile tizimvume tabasebentisi ukuze uqinisekise emazinga ekufinyelela lafanele.

reportsExports.title: Imibiko Nekukhipha
content: Khipha imibiko yekuhlolo ngefomethi ye-PDF ukuze wabelane nababambiqhaza kanye nemabhodi.
Sebentisa kukukhipha kwe-CSV ukuze uhlaziywe idatha futsi ulandzelele imikhuba ngokuhamba kwesikhatsi.
Landa emadokhumenti e-Word ukuze wenze sibhalo lesiningiliziwe kanye nezinjongo zemibiko.
Kukhiqizwa lokuvamile kwemibiko kusita ekuboniseni imizamo yekuthuthukisa lokuqhubekako.
Yabelana ngemibiko nemalunga kanye nababambiqhaza ukuze ugcine kukubonakala.

bestPractices.title: Imikhuba Lemihle Yetinkampani Letibambisene
content: Bandzakanya emalunga lahlukene eqembu ekuhloleni ukuze uthole imibono lephelele ngemikhuba yokusimama.
Nikeza timpendvulo letiningiliziwe, letiqotho ngetibonelo letithile kanye nesibhalo lesekelako.
Sebentisa imiphumela yekuhlolo ukuze udale emacebo wesenzo laqinisekile, lafezekisekayo wekuthuthukisa.
Emasikeli avamile wekuhlolo (onyakeni noma sigamu sonyaka) asita ekulandzeleleni inqubekela nekugcina umfutho.
Gubha kuthuthukisa futsi yabelana nempumelelo nemalunga akho enkampani lebambisene kanye nemphakatsi.

troubleshooting.title: Tinkinga Letivamile Netixazululo
content: Awukwazi kufinyelela ekuhloleni: Hlola nomphatsi wenhlangano yakho mayelana nekuniketwa kwetindima kanye nekufinyelela kutigaba.
Kuhlolo akugcini: Qinisekisa kutsi ugcwalisa zonke tinkambu letidingekako (Yebo/Cha, iphesenti kanye nekuchazela kwesibhalo).
Tinkinga tekulayisha emafayela: Emafayela kufanele abe ngaphansi kuka-1MB. Zama kunciphisa usayizi wefayela noma usebentise emafomethi lahlukene.
Awukwazi kubona lokuthunyelwe kwamanye emaqembu: Baphatsi benhlangano kuphela labangabona konke lokuthunyelwe.
Tigaba tekuhlolo letingekho: Xhumana nomphatsi wakho ukuze ahlole kukuniketwa kwetigaba yenhlangano yakho.

duringAssessment.title: Ngesikhatsi Sekuhlolo:
items: • Yiba qotho futsi ube ngokucacile etimpendvulweni

needHelp.title: Udinga Lusito?
needHelp.description: Uma udinga lusito noma unemibuto mayelana nokusebentisa ipulatifomu:
needHelp.contactAdmin: 💬 Xhumana nomphatsi wenhlangano yakho ngemibuto lethile yendima

adminGuide.title: Umhlahlandlela Womphatsi We-Pulatifomu ye-DGRV
adminGuide.subtitle: Umhlahlandlela lophelele wokuphatsa ipulatifomu yekuhlola kusimama ye-DGRV

quickStart.title: Kucala Lokusheshako
quickStart.step5: 5. 🎯 Sekela tinkampani letibambisene ohambweni lwazo lokusimama

overview.title: Kukuqonda Ipulatifomu
content: Ipulatifomu Yekuhlola Kusimama ye-DGRV yakhelwe kusita tinkampani letibambisene kulo lonke elaseNingizimu Afrika kutsi tilinganise futsi tithuthukise imikhuba yazo yokusimama.
Njengomphatsi, unokufinyelela kumathuluzi laphelele wokuphatsa tinkampani, basebentisi, lokukukethwe kwekuhlolo, kanye nekubuyekezwa kwekuthunyelwe.
Ipulatifomu isekela tilimi letiningi futsi isebenta ngaphandle kwe-inthanethi ukuze ihambisane netinkinga letihlukene tekuxhumana esifundeni.

organizations.title: Kukuphatsa Tinkampani
content: Engeza tinkampani letibambisene letintsha epulatifomu ngezaziso zazo leziyisisekelo kanye netizilungiselelo tedomaini.
Hlela tizilungiselelo letithile tenhlangano futsi uphate kufinyelela kwabasebentisi kutinkampani letibambisene ngayinye.
Qapha umsebenti wenhlangano futsi uqinisekise kukuhlukaniswa lokufanele kwedatha phakathi kwetinkampani letibambisene letihlukene.
Gcina noma susa tinkampani letingasasebenti kuyilapho ugcina idatha yazo yomlando.

users.title: Kukuphatsa Basebentisi
content: Dala futsi uphate ema-akhawunti abasebentisi kuzo zonke tinkampani nekuniketwa kwetindima letifanele.
Nikeza basebentisi tinkampani letithile futsi uhlele tizimvume tabo tekufinyelela.
Qapha umsebenti womsebentisi futsi uphate simo sekukuqinisekiswa kwe-akhawunti.
Qinisekisa kukuphepha lokufanele ngokubuyekezwa ngokuvamile kwekufinyelela kwabasebentisi nekusa ema-akhawunti langasebenti.

categories.title: Kukuphatsa Tigaba Tekuhlolo
content: Hlela tigaba tekuhlolo letihambisana nemikhuba lemihle yokusimama kanye nezidingo zendzawo.
Beka tizisindo letifanele kusigaba ngasinye ukuze uqinisekise emaphuzu ekuhlolo lalinganile.
Hlela tigaba ngokulandzelana lokunengqondo kwekubonisa ukuze uthole lwati lomsebentisi loluhle.
Buyekezwa futsi uvuselele tigaba ngokuvamile lesekelwe impendvulo kanye nemazinga ekuvuselelwa kusimama.

questions.title: Kukuphatsa Imibuto Yekuhlolo
content: Dala imibuto lephelele ngaphakathi kusigaba ngasinye ukuze uhlole ngokuphelele imikhuba yokusimama.
Nikeza imibuto ngetilimi letiningi ukuze usekele imiphakatsi yetinkampani letibambisene lehlukene.
Beka tizisindo kanye nokulandzelana kwekubonisa lokufanele kwemibuto ngaphakathi kusigaba ngasinye.
Buyekezwa futsi uvuselele imibuto ngokuvamile lesekelwe imiphumela yekuhlolo kanye nempendvulo yababambiqhaza.

reviews.title: Kukubuyekezwa Kwekuhlolo
content: Buyekezwa ngokuphelele kuhlolo lokuthunyelwe, ucabangele emaphuzu ezinga kanye netimpendvulo tekhwalithi.
Nikeza impendvulo leyakhiwe kanye nezindvululo letithile tekuthuthukisa.
Sebentisa ezindvululo ezivamile ukuze uqinisekise kuvumelana kuzo zonke tizihlolo.
Vuma, nqatsha, noma ucele kukubuyekezwa lesekelwe khwalithi kanye nekugcwalisa kwekuhlolo.

recommendations.title: Ezindvululo Ezivamile
content: Dala emamodeli ezindvululo lazi sebenzisekayo lesekelwe ezimo ezivamile zekuhlolo kanye netindzawo tekuthuthukisa.
Gcina umtapo wezindvululo zekhwalithi lephezulu lezingasetshenziswa kutinkampani letibambisene letihlukene.
Vuselela ezindvululo ngokuvamile lesekelwe imikhuba lemihle kanye nemasu wekuthuthukisa laphumelelayo.
Qinisekisa kutsi ezindvululo ziyasebenta futsi zifezekisekayo kutinkampani letibambisene letihlukene ngosayizi kanye nemithombo.

systemHealth.title: Impilo Nekusebenta Kwesistimu
content: Qapha ngokuvamile kusebenta kwepulatifomu, impilo yedatha, kanye netizikhathi tekuphendvula te-API.
Buyekezwa simo seqe lekuhambisana futsi uqinisekise kutsi kuhambisana kwedatha kusebenta kahle.
Khipha imibiko yesistimu kanye nemalogi ekuhlola ukuze wenze kuhambisana nekuxazulula tinkinga.
Gcina ema-backup avamile futsi uqinisekise kukuphepha kwedatha kuzo zonke izingxenye zepulatifomu.

support.title: Kusekela Tinkampani Letibambisene
content: Nikeza siqondiso kutinkampani letibambisene mayelana nokusebentisa ipulatifomu ngempumelelo ngezinjongo zazo zokusimama.
Nikeza kukuqeqeshwa kanye nemithombo yekusekela kusita tinkampani kutsi zikhulise inani lekuhlolo kwazo.
Qapha imikhuba yekuhlolo futsi ubone emathuba ekuthuthukisa ipulatifomu.
Akha budlelwane nabaholi betinkampani letibambisene ukuze uqonde ezidingo kanye netinkinga tabo letihlukile.

regularReviews.title: Kukubuyekezwa Lokuvamile:
items: • Buyekezwa kuhlolo lokusalindele lokungenani ngesonto ngalinye
• Qapha imethrikhi yempilo kanye nekusebenta kwesistimu
• Vuselela tigaba kanye imibuto lesekelwe impendvulo
• Gcina kuxhumana lokuvamile nabaholi betinkampani letibambisene

qualityAssurance.title: Kukuqinisekisa Khwalithi:
items: • Qinisekisa emazinga avumelane wokubuyekezwa kuzo zonke tizihlolo
• Nikeza impendvulo lokuningiliziwe, lesebenzisekayo kutinkampani letibambisene
• Yenta ema-backup avamile wedatha kanye netizilungiselelo tesistimu
